name: Alien Sports
description:
HI EVERYONE!!! Would you like to play and practice diferent sports at the same time?? This is my second jam solo and I've created a sports game where you can practice three diferent sports (football, golf and rugby) being an alien! 😆👽!

 The game plays with Unity phisics and I think that I get the environment and atmosphere I wanted (a little bit of chaos). Give it a try and play!! Please any comment and rate would be much apreciate it! Start rolling a ball!!
